response.original_title: Wow that’s what I call Christmas
response.overview: Carl, Katy, SuperTed, and Bump lead a group of merrymakers in a session of festive song and dance. The Christmas tunes featured include 'Here We Go Round the Christmas Tree', 'Twinkle, Twinkle Little Star', 'Five Christmas Puds' and 'We Wish You a Merry Christmas'. Ten pence from every video sold goes to the Pre-School Learning Alliance.
response.title: Wow that’s what I call Christmas
